title: Russia and China both restrict civil society

content.prompt: Although Russia is no longer a communist state, one feature it shares with communist China is

choices.label: continued opposition to the growth of capitalism
an unwillingness to become involved with international organizations like the World Trade Organization
government restrictions on the development of civil society
a majority of the economy is devoted to heavy industry

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
